meanings.sent1: Her undoubted talent shone through in every performance.
meanings.sent2: It is undoubted that the sun will rise tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The undoubted fact that cats rule the internet is widely accepted.
meanings.sent4: His undoubted loyalty to his friends is like a rock in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The undoubted beauty of the sunset took our breath away.

meanings.sent1: The undoubted success of the project was celebrated by all.
meanings.sent2: It is undoubted that honesty is the best policy.
meanings.sent3: The undoubted winner of the dance competition tripped on a banana peel.
meanings.sent4: Her undoubted courage in the face of danger inspired us all.
meanings.sent5: The undoubted power of love can conquer any obstacle.
